channel.title: data-augmentation on NTU-NLP
channel.description: Recent content in data-augmentation on NTU-NLP

item.title: UXLA: A Robust Unsupervised Data Augmentation Framework for Zero-Resouce Cross-Lingual NLP
item.description: We propose UXLA, a novel data augmentation framework for self-supervised learning in zero-resource transfer learning scenarios.
